name: Scout Kira

classFeatures.name: Expertise
classFeatures.description: Kira doubles proficiency bonus for Stealth and Perception checks.

classFeatures.name: Sneak Attack
classFeatures.description: Once per turn, Kira can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature she hits with an attack if she has advantage on the attack roll or an ally is within 5 feet of the target.

classFeatures.name: Thieves' Cant
classFeatures.description: Kira knows the secret rogue language.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: Kira can see in darkness up to 60 feet as if it were dim light.

racialTraits.name: Keen Senses
racialTraits.description: Kira is proficient in the Perception skill.

racialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
racialTraits.description: Kira has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic canâ€™t put her to sleep.

racialTraits.name: Trance
racialTraits.description: Kira only needs to meditate for 4 hours instead of sleeping.

racialTraits.name: Mask of the Wild
racialTraits.description: Kira can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

backgroundFeature.name: Wanderer
backgroundFeature.description: Kira has an excellent memory for maps and geography, and can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features. She can find food and fresh water for herself and up to five others each day, provided the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

equipment.description: A pack containing basic supplies for exploration.
Tools for picking locks and disarming traps.
A protective charm made of braided yew wood, granting resistance to magical corruption from the Voidstone.

attacksAndSpellcasting.name: Shortbow
attacksAndSpellcasting.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 piercing damage.

attacksAndSpellcasting.name: Shortsword
attacksAndSpellcasting.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 piercing damage.

personality_traits: I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups. Recently recognized by the community for my marksmanship and bravery, which has lifted my spirits and morale.
ideals: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. I now strive to be a beacon of hope and courage for those around me.
bonds: An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me. My bond to the Rangers' Outpost and its people has grown stronger with their recognition.
flaws: I remember every insult I've received and nurse a silent resentment toward anyone who's ever wronged me. However, I am learning to put aside grudges to focus on the greater good.
